name: SUP Racer
description:
SUP Racer is little sport game where you can challenge your friend to SUP race and show him WHO THE BOSS IS.

## CONTROLS ##

  • Player 1 is using "A" button to row.
  • Player 2 is using "L" button to row.
  • Press button to start rowing and release the button to pull the paddle out of the water. If you hold the paddle in the water for too long, the board will start to slow down. You cannot start another rowing move until the animation of pulling the paddle  out of the water ends and the character is in the correct position.
